packages.name: Advanced Zwave Dimmer Device Handler
packages.description: an Advanced Switch device handler that adds dimming and color control even if the switch does not have these capabilities. It allows switches hooked up without a load to control color bulbs from a dashboard or app

packages.name: Aeon Laundry
packages.description: Laundry Monitor via Aeon Home Energy Probes, set watt levels and turns on a switch when washer or dryer is done. You put one probe on washer circuit, one od dryer.

packages.name: Aeon SmartStrip
packages.description: Aeon SmartStrip Device Handler

packages.name: Alexa TTS APP and Driver w volume
packages.description: Alexa Voice TTS. not Written by me, but modified to add messages on cookie renew success or failure and setVolume Control

packages.name: Battery Monitor APP
packages.description: Nightly Battery Report

packages.name: Color Cast Weather
packages.description: Monitors Weather and alerts various types of Alerts via different color lights

packages.name: Color Coordinator
packages.description: Coordinates color changes from one switch to other switches

packages.name: RF9500 Switch Handler
packages.description: Cooper Eaton RF9500 Battery Powered Zwave button/switch driver to make it appear as a standard switch

packages.name: Dim with Me
packages.description: App to make multiple dimmers follow one main dimmer

packages.name: EZMulti aka hsm200 device handler
packages.description: Motion Sensor - Temperature - Light level - Color Indicator LED - Z-Wave Range Extender - Wall Powered, Features missing in stock device handler

packages.name: Stock Zwave Garage Door Handler with switch capability added
packages.description: Stock garage door handler port from smartthings with switch capablity added to work in Alexa

packages.name: Garden Hue Smartapp
packages.description: App originally written for Lightify Garden spots to allow color cycling and user selectable times, comes on automatically as sunset etc. but works with any color lights, can also set colors for holidays

packages.name: Homi Heiman Natural Gas Sensor Device Handler
packages.description: Homi Heiman Gas sensor device handler, alerts as standard smoke as Hubitat has no natural gas capability

packages.name: Hubitat Smart Alarm
packages.description: A Special notication device for hubitat that gets preformated strings for various alerts and allows you to use its attributes on tiles

packages.name: Is My Home Secure
packages.description: An App ported from smartthings that checks various door windows etc on mode change and alerts if secure or open, and will try to re-lock doors if unlocked.

packages.name: Keen Vent LGK
packages.description: Keen Smart Vent Device Handler that adds temp. and pressure monitoring not in the stock device handler, also adds switch, contact and door capabilities

packages.name: Hubitat Native SendMail implementation
packages.description: Sendmail implemented natively in Hubitat, with or without authentication, uses internal telnet

packages.name: LGK APC Smart UPS Status
packages.description: A Device handler to connect direct to APC Smart UPS's ie smt1500 with network cards via telnet, reports on battery level, runtime, temp. and whether on battery or power, can be use to automate shutdowns when runtime/battery is low

packages.name: LGK Virtual Garage Door APP
packages.description: Port of the original app from smartthings to link a switch/relay and contact/tilt sensor together and make it look like a standard garage door control device. Includes app and drivers

packages.name: Link 2 Switches
packages.description: An App that Makes one switch follow another

packages.name: Ct100 Thermastat Device Handler
packages.description: My ct100 Thermatat device handler originally written for smartthings

packages.name: UtilTech Siren Device Handler
packages.description: UtilTech Siren Device Handler but works with any Zwave Siren

packages.name: Qubino Weather Station
packages.description: A Port of my customized Qubino weather station device handler, from smartthings with min/max added (Currently loads but no data is coming in)

packages.name: Roof Coil Controller
packages.description: A smart app written to turn on/off a switch between two date ranges, and temperature ranges. I use it to turn on roof coil switch between dec-apr when temp. is between 30-40, but settings are customizable. Used to prevent ice dams if I forget to turn heater switch on

packages.name: Eversource ST814 Temp and humidity device handler
packages.description: A custom device handler for the Eversource st814 temp/humidity device. The only one I know temp rated to go in freezers. It has 3 AA Batteries

packages.name: Spruce Controller
packages.description: A port of the Spruce version 1 (zwave non-wifi) smartapp scheduler and device handler from smartthings to Hubitat

packages.name: Honeywell Total Comfort API
packages.description: The older version of the honeywell API total control Thermastat driver (non child device handler) Newer one is not working for me

packages.name: Tesla App and Driver (DEPRECATED Get V3 of the app)
packages.description: The smart connect app and driver for the tesla monitoring and control. Not written by me but modified by me to add variable poll time, lockout times when it stops polling to allow sleep and charage port lock/unlock custom capability

packages.name: Zwave water Valve device handler
packages.description: A Zwave valve device handler originally written for the evb105 valve but works with any. Tested with dome and leakgopgher and leaksmart. Adds Switch Door Contol (ie open close) and contact sensor capiblity. Also light on/off control

packages.name: Enerwave ZW15SM high amperage switch device handler
packages.description: Enerwave Zw15sm zwave and zwave plus high amp energy monitoring switch device handler

packages.name: Zigbee White Color Temp Device Handler
packages.description: A generic Zigbee white temperature contolleable bulb device handler, with custom capabilities/tiles for various temps. orignially written for lightify A19 bulbs

packages.name: Tesla V3 App and Driver
packages.description: The new V3 of the smart connect app and driver for the tesla monitoring and control of your autos.

packages.name: Tesla vehicle status and control via Tessie - App and Driver
packages.description: Control and query the status of all your tesla vehicles. This is the app and driver both needed.
